Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Boston in 2016...
Injured on 6/6/2016 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/12/2016, off Robert Mazur (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2017, off Andrew Hutzler (NY)...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2017, hitting .334 with 10 HR, 73 RBI...
Injured on 5/12/2018 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2018, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 8/29/2018 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2018, hitting .394 with 3 HR, 17 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,535,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,835,714 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2021, hitting .474 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2021, hitting .375 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,850,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2022, hitting .423 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
10/20/2022: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $14,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Injured on 4/17/2023 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/23/2023 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Boston to St. Louis (B) on 6/10/2024 (Going to BOS: P Jack Fenderson, CF George Mullin Jr.. Going to SLB: CF Alberto Vasquez)...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/14/2024 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won MVP in 2024, hitting .315 with 21 HR, 100 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston on 4/27/2025...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2025, hitting .538 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2025...
Won MVP in 2025, hitting .318 with 20 HR, 96 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2026, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2026...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/1/2027 to a 1-year deal worth $17,000,000 per year...
Hit 3 homeruns against Houston, driving in 4 runs on 4/19/2027...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2027, hitting .542 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2027, hitting .367 with 12 HR, 32 RBI...
Was selected to the 2027 Allstar game...
Won MVP in 2027, hitting .322 with 37 HR, 123 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2027...
10/21/2027: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (B), $18,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Was selected to the 2028 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2028, hitting .471 with 0 HR, 3 RBI...

Had 2000th career hit on 8/12/2028, off Kevin Stewart (KC)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2028...
Injured on 5/2/2029 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
